Reviews: Received damaged productAll scratched

Gifted this to my mother. She was reluctant to use it first as she is used to the usual frying process. But as she got used to it, she loved it! She still thanks me for this (even after 2 years) because this has made her life so much easier. Some yummy snacks can be made in this air fryer with minimal effort. It's especially great if guests are coming over and you quickly want to prepare snacks. Amazing product! And Philips is better than other brands in this category.

My product was broken when it arrived. Unfortunately I was out of town (proof of travel available) when the product was delivered and could only check a month later to be shocked and feel so much of my hard earned money was wasted. Its kept untouched and unused. Please help if you can

It is definitely easy to use n totally mess free but it Is definitely not easy to clean. My biggest complaint is that there is no recipe book with the airfryer. Didn't expect this from a company like Phillips who is a pioneer in this field .After buying a product worth 10 k ,they expect us to search for recipes online!!!

Finally unboxed the item and tried to cook fries and found out that the the product was damaged . Really disappointed that I received a defective product after paying so much money. Not worth it at all

We bought this a couple of days back and tried to prepare French fries multiple times, but not even once were the potatoes fully prepared. We prepared it for 45-50 minutes on 180 and 200 degree, but it never worked. It just made the potatoes a little warm and that's all. Philips is not more a trusted brand, the light switches on for just a minute and turns off. The technician even couldn't cook potato fries(very small pieces) himself even after 20-25 minutes. Also the technian/customer support in Bangalore is bossy, even though their visiting hours are from 9-6, the technician says he works only between 12-4 and is not ready to come after 4. Philips isn't doing things correctly.

Not at all a pleasant experience as it seems I have received an Used product. There area) Scratches all over the bodyb) Tray when opened couldn’t be closed completely due to a loose part in the Tray compartment which was obstructing Tray closure.c) Box should have User Manual, Recipe Book (as shown in unboxing videos). There are no such things present inside the box.Have ordered for a replacement.

Review Title: Should have been supplied with a Separator as shown in ...
Reviews: Should have been supplied with a Separator as shown in the VIDEO.And also an additional Roasting  Rack, which was advertised separately,Cost at Rs 900/- considered too high.At additional discounted cost, however.

It is nice airfryer come with heavy socket electric cord .Arrived in safe package in big box without any damaged . Come with indian receipe book. I tried fish with it and it is tasty. Just follow the book for use. Easy to clean .
Air frier technology is not at all good for frying. It use heat & high speed air  which make the food very dry.For healthy cooking (oil less) micro oven is best.

Received it 2 days back. On time delivery. Cheers amazon. Tried it today with a variety of frozen foods..Excellent product. The only reason I deduct 1* is, for if it says 20min of fry time, do 15min. If u follow the book recipes u will have dry hard food. Bad recipes or chefs who guided them on timing. Discover ur own textures. Overall hardware is good.

Review Title: Excellent, using it from last 4 years
Reviews: Using it from last 4 years. Bot new one for relatives.Pros:easy to useGives really good flavour as compared to other air fryers.Minimize oil consumptionDiscards excessive oilCons:Costly as compared to competitorsExperience: its really good product and we use it atleast once a week,You can cook tasty chicken, mutton, fish veggitables, kababs, cookies and most of the things that needs rosti g or frying (except Bhaji which has too much liquid)
Cleaning is not quite easy, quantity it can handle is good for small family of 2/3. Operation is extremely easy.

Review Title: Ideal for bachelor not for family
Reviews: I returned this product since it had small capacity, not ideal for family of 4. It is good if you are a bachelor and eat 3-4 only pieces of grilled chicken. Else for a family you would have to do many rounds of grilling which defeats the purpose of saving time with this gadget. There are other bigger ovens in the other brands with lower or same cost which is ideal to cook for a family and provided with many accessories. Philips air frier is good only for one dish mainly, French fries, but then that's it.
A used product was delivered. We had gifted this and the pack was opened only today. Oil stains were seen and oil smell also felt.  Now it is beyond returnable period. Feel cheated

Review Title: Philips Daily Collection HD9218 Air Fryer
Reviews: Arrived on time and was well packed. This is the second Philips Air Fryer I am ordering so obviously I am happy with the product. Sad to see that the "ON" Indicator light has been quietly deleted from this model. Who knows why! It was a useful feature to have and a backward step on the part of Philips to remove it. Have docked them 1 star for this.

We decided to buy it to avoid oily food and it worth it! Even French fries is perfect in that, we tried already few things and it’s really good in taste, easy to use and fast as well. It’s better that oven actually.

Review Title: Damaged product recieved and not accepting return any soon
Reviews: It's really disappointing that the product I recieved was malfunctioning  and its motor isn't functioningWhen tried to place a return of itemNobody is picking up the call from help centerNeither Amazon is responding to my return requestIf they can't give this much customer support I'll be forced to withdraw any purchase from Amazon in future..
Received broken product, had to return it.

Excellent product, no oil required I luv it this is my second air fryer for my cousin as a gift. You need to buy a metal brush to clean the metal mesh, better to soke the frying pan for easy cleaning.

Review Title: Health and smile can go hand in hand
Reviews: I have used the air fryer for a week now and below is my experience.I have been trying a lot around cooking, i have tried everything from frying.. oven.. cooker,  name it and i would have tested it.Air fryer is the first goto option when you want an easy to use appliance and get best taste out.Phillips has killed it with this model. Its an absolute delight to have such fryer around. You can twist recipes based on your needs. It is easiest appliance i have used for cooking. Fun and Health.. what else you want the fryer to do. Put the delicious food into your mouth. Lol

Bacon, prawns, burger patties are both tastier and easier to make in this. We've had fun making a whole host of items in this - fries, chicken legs, grilled paneer, grilled veggies etc.A lot of times, I buy pre-marinated meat from Licious and just pop it into the air fryer. Easiest cooking ever :)Anything you'd grill/fry come out really well and cook in 5-15 minutes. Perfect for lazy people.

Received the product, there was no instruction manual accompanying the fryer. A skimpy printout, in a million languages, extremely brief and uninformative. I am extremely disappointed, at least a basic recipe book is a must. I had expected a better accompaniment from a reputed company, like Philips. There is no way the cord retracts, as mentioned. Am sorry that the product is non-returnable, else I would have opted for it at once. An expensive trinket for the kitchen DISAPPOINTED, TOTALLY. Am stuck with it. A total NO-NO.

Review Title: Get the correct instructions for proper  useage of the product.
Reviews: I am afraid I cannot give an opinion on the product as it has not been used so far. There are no clear instructions nor a brochure illustrating the proper useage of the product. I do not want to damage the product without proper instructions. This is an expensive product !I would be grateful if I can get proper instructionson for its useage. I am sure it is a very good product, but I have to  first use it. Hope I can get positive response from concerned department on my query.Thank you,Rajiv Menon

Review Title: No after sales service in my location
Reviews: There was no product demo online, nor did any person visit to demo the usage.It was a bad after sales service experience in my location.I tried contacting philips customer care fpr hours, but never got connected to any of their operatives.I am clueless how to use it and the fear of burning away the air frier keeps me from using the product.

Review Title: Think before you buy. Check other brands as well
Reviews: Demo provided by company after 8days and when used for first time, it stopped working within 15min. Logged complaint with Philips n they said can repair but denied aa new product. Logged complaint on national consumer forum n Philips replaced product in 10days.Bought on 27oct and got replacement on 28nov

Review Title: Looks good but no user manual or cooking guide
Reviews: Package and delivery was up to mark. Thanks Amazon. There is no user manual ot cooking instructions help documents included with it. If you buy from Chroma you get the same. Manual attachment on discription page is corrupted and unable to access it.Now will have to check on you tube..will provide more feedback once I use it.

Review Title: Not worth the money...too much hype of electric fryer
Reviews: Its not so sophisticated...not sure why they charge so much in the name of a electric fryer. Once started there’s no button to stop or pause, even when you take out the tray the fry still runs....I hope someone would have already figured out to make an electric fryer with a small fan on top of a heating coil
Product is good.But, Amazon should disclose date of manufacture in advertisement.It was more than two years old manufacture.

Review Title: Product has scratch on the teflon coating, no booklet
Reviews: Really disappointed by the Air Fryer. There was no instruction guide,  recipe booklet, warranty card, etc. Looks like a used product. Once we open the pull out container found a scratch inside over the teflon coating . Didn't expect this from a brand like Philips. Bad experience.

Review Title: Worst experience with Amazon. Philips had loat one customer today
Reviews: Worst product received from Amazon had received airfryer in broken condition. The courier person was bad in speaking he dint helped me replacing my item thought he bought a new replaced Airfryer he took it back saying that you might have demanded it.

Versatile product, easy to use. Innovation in recipes can be tried for optimum utilization. I've tried baking, making curries, frying onions for masala of curries after buying the accessories...very little oil needed so overall healthier cooking without compromising on taste

Review Title: Something gave way on first use!
Reviews: It seemed very nice & strurdy. But after 1st use, a metal strip, don't know what it is supposed to do, came down and blocked the food tray from going in again. Likely to return.

Compared to other Air Fryer, Philips product is robust and lasts long. Have used it since the day we received it. Great product. No issue at all.  Good value for money. We were a bit apprehensive about the product after reading reviews by other users. But found the product to be a great one. Must have if you want to have tasty and healthy food.

Review Title: Philips Airfry is a wonderful User Friendly Product
Reviews: Philips Airfry is a wonderful User Friendly Product,  very useful for people who are Calorie Conscious.... Thank u Amazon for Prompt Delivery with Good Packing

Review Title: Recipe book and warranty card found missing.
Reviews: Recipe book and warranty card found missing in the box..please arrange to deliver to my address since it is a part of complete package.Kindly resolve the issue at the earliest.A line of confirmation in this regard will be highly appreciated.Looking forward for a favourable response.

Received the product with a spring loose, so it wasn't easy to insert/remove the tray. The replacement also has the same defect. GLittle disappointed that I received a defective product twice, but Amazon return/refund was hazzle free.The packaging was good. So, I guess this is a manufacturing/factory defect.

Whilst the overall product is designed and works well. The quality that you expect from Philips in the wiring that connects the appliance to the electric socket is not done well. The coil holding has come lose in less than one month of use and one wire is sticking out.
The product is a must in every household, happy with the purchase. It's only drawback is the cleaning process; as the food tends to stick to the grill and it becomes difficult to clean.

Roast food evenly. Frozen snacks come out so well that you can't tell the difference between fried ones or Air-Fried ones.if you are a foodie and still want to avoid oil, then definitely go for it.  Only one thing is , it is very difficult to clean.

Very disappointed with the item, received my air fryer today with crack on the handle and front left side of the air fryer is broken with the  size of table tennis ball hole. I am scared to reorder this time again

Reduces 90% fat and 75% guilt.Convenient and useful.The hearing time and preparation time seems a little too much, with 15-20 minutes preheat time and an equal food preparation time, but it’s worth it. Everything is so crisp and well made.

The product should be checked before dispatch by seller weather it is in working condition as quality check. Why the faulty product delivered by such big brand. Further Amazon has removed the option of return. Customer faith has been shaken after buying branded without option of return the product , if it is faulty.

Review Title: Superb airfryer for all your snack needs.
Reviews: Wonderful cute device for healthy snacks. Enjoying daily/ weekly using it . Can’t write more. Have no words. Can’t forget its “ting” calling bell once the snack is ready..😄 Highly recommended.

These are some of the pics of all cooking done. We just love the airfyer..I couldnt find the pic of Samsosa and Gujiya..but everything is prepared very well. I am reviewing it after 1year of regular use. It's a must buy.

Review Title: If you are conscious to bring down the oil in take in your food, this is a good product.
Reviews: For those who are becoming conscious of daily consumption of oil through our staple food, this is a great product to add to your kitchen.  Apart from the recipe suggested by Phillips' cook-book, you have a lot of opportunity to be creative as to how you want to use it.

I have used air fryers before and never had this problem. The basket is not going into the air fryer. I have not even used it once properly. How am I supposed to cook anything if the basket is not locked into the fryer?Why is amazon sending so many defective products like this. Don't you guys do quality checks.Waste of 10,000. If I can give zero stars I would.

Used item...!!Body full of scratches...inner tray rusted, full of oil stains and stinking of fried chicken.Even droplets of water found in the tray, clearly indicating someone has used...washed...and repacked the item.
Received damage product

A very versatile product. From making tikkas to fried items to baking cakes, everything comes out perfect.The only con is sometimes the food items stick to the grill mesh and it can be a little difficult to clean. Though some racks are available using which can make our work easier but we have to buy it extra not provided with this product.
The handle broke om day 1Myblast philipsair fryer (from amazon) was amazing qualityI didn't even look for another brand even though they were cheaperTerrible qualityVery dissapointed

Review Title: Test is best but not par with the price
Reviews: 1. Inner space is very less as compare to oven2. Time consuming3. Less fat upto 90 % how this formulated . What is the base for that.4. This product tagged Made in china came know after purchasing
The product received was damaged. The handle was lose. The first day the fryer made a loud noise. The next day it stopped working. Had to return it as replacement was not possible.
The product is very good. However, we could not find the Operational manual Book and Recipe Book inside the box.Please arrange to send them at the earliest.

Awesome hassle free Roasting, Grilling and Frying and that too unbelievable without oil.100% oil free. Be it Chicken, or Fries. They are just unbeatable...Super quality non stick surface, just clean with wet cloth and some soap to get it ready for use again😎
Oil-free cooking. The taste is a bit different because the oil is not there - but not bad at all!Good capacity. Especially if you cook non-veg often, this makes it soooo guilt-free!
I love this air fryer. It does consume quite a bit of electricity, but overall I am happy. I have cooked quite a few things in it such as fries and samosa, and all of it tastes great.

So this is how it was delivered. Broken and shattered into pieces. The plug was also burnt, tray handle was burnt, knobs were pulled out, scratch marks all over. It was a completely damaged piece!! So very disappointed!

Kindly forward fresh copy of bill as the previous bill is incomplete.Philips customer care are not willing to accept the incomplete bill for warranty.Kindly confirm ASAP.Kindly forward the fresh copy of bill in my mail id-  lokeshrawal. rawal@gmail.com
Very happy with the product.. It is very useful. Very easy to use. 😍

Review Title: FAKE, FRAUD & CHINA Prouduct, STICKY Base
Reviews: Have an horrible experience with tandoori and tikka items. See the picture how sticky its base is. PHILIPS is an absolutely FAKE and FRAUD Company. I am thinking how to return it. Amazon only replaces but doesn't return.

Review Title: Trust branded more more at philips
Reviews: Philips what write coment always this brand i think all product its awasome....this product its amazing
Very bad experience....never recomond this product,first time broken grill of exhausted, replacement done with open package and made in China.....vary much disappointed

Review Title: Fast and a very effective way of cooking.
Reviews: Fantastic piece of technology. It is reliable. Cooking in this air fryer is an experience. It is easy and cooks perfect. The taste of food cooked in this air fryer is subjective as we are so used to eating oil fried food. It takes a while to adjust our taste buds. But, gives you the guilt free feeling. I recommend this product to each and everyone. It is a worth product in your kitchen.
The product is working as per expectations but the point is that this product is not made in India.

Excellent product if you have not still bought this then buy it actually works! I has no radiation just simple mechanism that it has coil which heats up and a high speed fan which flows air through the coil i.e. air gets hot due to coil and that hot air fries the food simple .And best part is no need of oil!
It is easy to operate with virtually no technology. Boneless chicken can be cooked in 15 mins at 200 degree.
Pros:Good healthy foodEasy to useCons:The manual timer is a bit loose and difficult for precise setting.
It is a great product..but will be very happy if the power cable length is increases and the tray net will be at best quality....😘😍today it is delivered and me n my mom made tasty french fries.....

Got a fake one the first time. Did not even come in an authentic Phillips box. Post exchange, the product came packed in a Philips box and seems authentic. Be careful when you order. Ensure it’s completely sealed and that the fryer is also neatly packed and has stickers on the product.
Works fine, easy to operate, great product to cook healthy oil free meal. But I didn’t receive the recipe book as mentioned the product description.

Have cooked chicken, made cakes and biscuits too in this. Very easy to use and clean. Have had it for more than a year now. With proper use and maintenance it's still as good as new. Please note as this is small size, large amount if good will have to be cooked in batches. If you are cooking large amount often go for a larger sized airfryer.

Review Title: Better to buy in shop not in amazon
Reviews: There is no air fryer basket steel lid.There is no philips catalogue nor recipe book.Dont buy online
No recipe booklet. Not sure how to use. App also only has 9 recipes. Can someone help here. Buyer needs to help.
There is NO proper instruction booklet on exactly how to use the air fryer? Only leaflet of problem shooting, danger, warning???

Review Title: Due to manufacturing defect. it cannot be repaired.so please cancel this order  .
Reviews: I have opened the product on yesterday.its unable to use due to manufacturing defect.we call Philips service centre.they came here and told it's manufacturing fault and cannot repair. So request you to please cancel this order and reverse my money at the earliest.

Good product, very less oil but taste remains same. Tried french fingers, wedges, tikkis, pizza pockets, bhindi fry and other similar stuff. My kids enjoyed. Keep in mind fo pre heat and set temperature as per the instructions given in the manual

Review Title: wonderful. healthier cooking options. very easy to handle.
Reviews: cooks meat ,fish, chicken very fast and easy to operate. time saving and finally maintains the taste.
The inside filter does not dismantle in this product so baking a cake gets difficult as you can install only a smaller baking vessel inside it. Not bad though
After one month of usage, I am happy with the product. Good for oil free cooking.
And Tasty. Easy to use. Real, new food possibilities for expanding the variety of food at home.
Product quality is good and easily we can go through. For food lovers it’s a must product that your kitchen needed.

Review Title: Very good and must buy for health
Reviews: Fantastic product. you can enjoy your snacks without oil. My children's are loving it.
Faulty design, returned it twice as it had the same problem
Product was good overall. Good taste, almost no oil, just like eating fried food. But the packaging by Amazon was bad. Everything seemed torn. Disappointed in the packaging.
Product is good and very clean, no damage and this is the pic of first item made in it.(Could anyone help with how to fry fyumus in it?) The product was good
Doesn't really work the way you want it to work , the food keeps getting burnt not just this ! Wouldn't suggest buying an airfyer ! Could rather invest that money on a convection oven

Review Title: Making customers fool as its origin is China although Phillips is a Netherlands company
Reviews: Product is good but made in China, this is my hated ciuntry and Amazon is selling this product although i have purchased seeing the Phillips brand name

Review Title: Convenient and healthy option of cooking
Reviews: I am happy to use it on regular basis to cook fish, chicken, fries and vegetables. It takes a while to optimise it's use in terms of time to air fry the given item, but oil use reduces drastically. Marinating is an important step.
Find it effective as it consumes significantly less oil
I just opened the packaging and the product is broken.
I got the product as they mentioned in the website, i got it in time. I am using this product everyday as of now no pblm, quality is good.
Seller has supplied a defective product. Have to coordinate with Philips persons to fix the problem
I used this product for preparing chicken and French fry. Chicken preparation was not up to the mark. I tried lots of time but the taste is not good of the material which is prepare in it

I have used it only twice as purchase is very recent.  I tried a recipe in the booklet.  It was fine.  I tried kurdai,  a Maharashtrian dried savory which needs frying to fluff it and make it crisp. That too was crunchy and light though didn't fluff. I am happy with the product
Must for health conscious people.
No instruction manual or recipe book..unclear how to even open the fryer..extremely disappointed
The product does what it's intended to do. I guess seller misplaced the recipe book

I bought this item and it was not working properly. Returned it and requested for replacement but the second one was also defective with its spring out of the coil. Expected a better service from both Amazon and Philips. Very disappointed.
Really good.. it gives the same fried taste with the least bit of oil
Works well. ,Less space for cooking .
Genuine product and very easy to use. We are able to cook Samosa and fries with barely a brush coat of oil. Got an excellent bargain.
Product is good as expected. Very easy to use. Food can made in very less oil. Good for health.👍👍👍👍👍
Damaged product delivered!
Good and useful product.In the included component section of the product it was mentioned that cook book is in. But product recevied didn't have it.
The indicator light sometimes goes off after 15 days of buying.

Review Title: Amazing product by Philips and a great price from Amazon.
Reviews: Amazing product by Philips and a great price from Amazon. A must buy for foodies.Received a cashback of Rs.1500 which got credited to the account after 3 months. No problem there as this was the condition at the time of buying.
Product delivered without warranty card, recipe book is not available and even no  giude sticker pasted on the product to use and  there no receipe book inside.

Review Title: Easy to use, making food tasty and healthy
Reviews: Very easy to use, cooking food without oil, which is good for health.Taking very less time to cook, and food is very tasty even we use less spices.I recomend to not to take air fryer of any other company cause it takes more time to cook compaire to philips air fryer.
The product is easy to use and easy to clean . Setting it up is easy. Best to fry frozen fried food.In 15 mins food is ready. Capacity is also good.Amazon delivery was also on time.

Review Title: One day you will have it
Reviews: A must for every homemaker who cares for her family and believe in low oil cooking. This philips  item is a top notch product
Good one for health watchers. Till now I have prepared only chicken recipes and it really works well. Quality of the product is fine and good handling.
I bought this last month. Not used much. But have tried fries, chucken n fish fry. They turned out crisp n good. And most impt, it is stress free.
I have tried like 3 air fryers till today but this one is the best , the packing quality and the product quality both are the best.
Been using it for a year regularly to fry chicken and French fries. Fries with zero oil yet tastes good. Does not have accessory to fry papad and cleaning is a challenge.

Review Title: Very poor customer service for this product
Reviews: Model was delivered without operation manual, cook book and warranty cardLooks like somebody had returned after purchase and kept the documents with himself
Very good
Works well like all other air fryers. Sturdy and looks like it's  been built tough. Does what it says. Consuming less oil now.
No user manual. No warranty Card, no recipe guide. Item sent is manufactured in China
We have not received any user manual and operational instructions and recipe books.
worst product, you can always buy a better  product half of this price
Very good experience since purchased. Always found best performance. Cleaning is bit tricky.
Amazing product, didn't believe first that one can fry less oil or without oil. My entire family is very happy and Yes this is Healthy Family gift on Diwali I gave to my family

Review Title: Good product, havent tried all the recipes yet
Reviews: Good product, havent tried all the recipes yet. Fries seem to turn out Good, Cutlet too. Oil Consumption is greatly reduced thanks to this. Takes around 10-15 mins for fries to be done.
Wish there were recipes
Good
Excellent

Review Title: Very cheap product, not worth buying
Reviews: Very cheap productnot worth buyingBasket is worstWith just 15 mins outer surface got too heat
Did not receive the recipe book.For such an expensive product not getting complete set is unacceptable.
It cooks well with zero oil.
Philips I love you bro. Good product go for it.
Best in class , very useful and nice product from Philips
Useful but is not that good as the one I used in the U.S
Must have product at home. I use it on a daily basis to heat up breads, cook frozen food and even serve hot roti and Paratha.
Easy to use
Great product.
iTS ONLY LIKE AS ITS THE SOLUTION  TO MANY OBSTACLES WE WERE FACING FOR QUICK FIXES
Product was as advertised. Timely delivered, no issues.. working well and has reduced our cooking oil consumption at home.. very satisfied with the product
I got defective product. The cooking tray is not closing as there is an obstruction.It's not useable at all.Not sure how this passed quality control.
Excellent product. Prompt delivery. Good packing. Product exactly as shown on amazon.

Review Title: Healthy and oil free food made easy.
Reviews: Easy to clean.Can cook a lot of dishes oil free.Must have if you want to eat healthy food.Just make sure to register the product for warranty on Phillips website.
I bought this product and the seller gave me a faulty product. The handle is not closing due to some loose part inside.
Excellent product and worth a buy for quick and healthy snacking

Review Title: Every house who can afford should have this.
Reviews: Very nice we at home enjoying making some good staf with very less oil, really worth buying
Too costly, after buying don't feel any premium feel for that cost. I recommend to purchase some other brand which is cheap and best..
I reviewed my order today but there is no recipe book in it. Now how am i supposed to use it😓😓. Otherwise its kind of good.......

Review Title: Very Happy with this healthy cooking product
Reviews: Superb Product! Love the low oil cooking without compromising the taste.Good with time required for cooking as well.The only challenge is limited quantity of food that can be cooked at a time. If there were racks available that could help layer the food while cooking it would help optimize the use of capacity available.Amazon delayed my delivery but the product compensates for that.
Very good productReally we are enjoying cooking in Philips air fryer. It's performance is far better than others I have seen

Review Title: one of the best choice after AMC cookware
Reviews: The best product for making fried items which go as side dish with rice in south India. Power consumption is not significant.my wife is quite pleased now..She was not when I ordered it.
Good product. The packaging from amazon was just superb. No complain at all.
It's not getting locked. We got faulty product. It's not even a month and we are facing issue. Please replace.
Nice item
excellent product. tandoors are awesome. go for it.
RECEIVED A BROKEN PRODUCT 2nd timeAwful experience
Gave it as a present and they liked ut
Nice compact and easy to use product form Philips.Have been using it for more than 2 years now, good quality.

Excellent product. Makes the food a bit dry though. However, its just about learning how to cook with it. The food retains original taste, as when cooked using traditional methods. All in all, a good buy.

Love this product ! It makes everything so easy . Any kind of frozen food can be consumed within 15-20 minutes of heating time . Best part 0% oil is required to cook the food. This is one appliance every one should buy !
Received used product please check your product
Awasome product. Easy to use and cooks healthy food.
Bye bye oily food, eat fried stuff with fraction of oil and guilt.
Meets Expectation
I got the product wth broken handle.Outside box was ok.Inspite of repeated calls product has not been picked up & refunded.
Easy to use and maintain....snacking without frying in oil
Got a defective  product....how is it that the packaging is so bad..of such an expensive product!

Review Title: Helps one achieve Balance between Taste and health
Reviews: Pros:Frozen food can be fried with minimal oilTaste is fairly good.Simple to useImprovements suggested:1. Documentation can be much better. It will make produce more helpful
Handle was cracked. Inner surface of outer container has scratches and has an undulating surface at some places.
I haven't received the recipe book and also, there are scratches on the product.
Defective item recieved two times. It’s better to go to chroma and buy by Checking the product yourself.
Loved the air fryer. It was neatly packed. Used it two times and had no problem so far.
very easy to use and clean
Recieved a faulty product. Handle was broken
Perfect mate for oil free cooking
Decent product, but cant match taste of actual fried items, good for health conscious ppl, not for taste conscious
Excellent product. Healthy dishes are prepared in very short time. Must recommended for buy.

Awesome product if you are on a less oil diet. You will have to grease the food with the little oil before placing it there otherwise it gets sticky. But the best thing is you no more have to deep fry your food. It tastes as good as deep fried.

Review Title: Go For it!! Its a must for Indian homes
Reviews: Air Frying! An awesome technology!! Tried french fries, samosas and all kinds of frozen stuff.. No difference in taste from deep frying in oil.. Its a healthy alternate to all kinds of deep frying..
Repalced it once but to this day doesn't work properly.
Value for money good product

Review Title: Manual guide is an important part of the product.
Reviews: The product contained no user guide or manual or recipe book. It would be nice if the same could be forwarded to me.

Review Title: Very useful for the health conscious
Reviews: First of all, great deal and timely delivery thanks to Amazon. This is very useful product for the health conscious. The results are very good when eatables are fired with very less oil. The point to note here is that the food items are well cooked in the air fryer but they will definitely taste slightly different since we are used to those soaked in oil. But the crispiness and moisture is retained as in deep frying....unlike when cooked in a microwave. The frying process takes slightly longer time than usual deep frying so you have to cater for more time especially when entertaining guests. The air fryer is most useful for dry or semi-dry items like samosa , kachori only. It cannot be used to fry items dipped in besan or viscous items. All in all, it is a very useful item and can drastically reduce our oil consumption.

Thats why I love Philips. They made super awesome products. It's completely make your oily food oil-free and tasty. Go for it. I bought it a year ago and not a single issue and use it every alternate days.

Review Title: For the healthy plate of fried snacks!!!!!!
Reviews: This is the perfect appliance for the foodies!!! When u think of fried snacks u think of calories and all that oil intake and toiling at the gas stove. Since I got this appliance enjoying the fried snacks is easier. The perfect even golden color crisp snacks with no oil makes for a healthy snack!

This is great product. As described by the company it uses a awesome technology of air and heat. You can make rotis, parathas , samosa, fringer chips and many more items wit minimum use of oil. If you use 1 spoon full of oil to make parathas then in this you just need to use 2 drops of oil and rest this cooker would take care. So if you want to enjoy junky food and still want remain healthy and go ahead buy this product. But remember do not buy it from snapdeal.com I repeat do not buy it from snapdeal.com. Best place to buy today is amazon.in. You can check other websites but don't ever buy it form snapdeal.com.

Review Title: Amazing product from philips and superb service from Amazon
Reviews: Seller service was good. So was Amazon's.This is my first Amazon purchase. I was surprised when the product arrived just two days after purchase! I bought a hard drive some days after buying this. It was also delivered within 2 days!Way to go Amazon! You should beat Snapdeal and even Flipkart with ease.Coming to the product, now that I have used it thrice, I can vouch it does what the company claims it does. My mom made potato fries, "parothas" and 'bora's(a bengali cutlet) with absolutely 0% oil. I am sensitive to oily food, so I bought this. For over a decade I have been avoiding fried delicacies. Now after all these years I am finally able to taste fried food, thanks to Philips Airfryer.If you are a health freak like me but still want to eat fried stuff, then go for it.You will not regret it.I

I am very satisfied with this product. Just received 2 days back and tried fries and roasted veggies (Capsicum, okra, brinjal, pumpkin, onion, bitter gourd, cauliflower, green peas all together ) and I was really surprised with the result. I just used 1 tsp olive oil and mixed herbs (oregano, basil, thyme, chilly flakes etc) and the taste was really good. First time I could eat around 300 gm veggies without any guilt. I love vegetables but I was avoiding because of too much of oil in cooking. I tried lot of time in nonstick pan with very less oil but the taste was horrible so I gave up that method also but after trying with this air fry I just loved it in first attempt. This is really a great product and I thank Philips and Amazon both for making my life much more healthier. If your story match with myself then I would strongly recommend you to try it out. I should have bought this long back -:)

Love the Philips airfryer. Pondered lots before buying it. Finally bought it during promotion and even availed attractive cash back. Works really well. So far have tried frozen snacks, haryali kebabs, bread rolls, French fries with it and they have turned out fine. Samosas cook the best. Technique needs to be figured out with practice. Texture will be slightly different but we really don’t mind as it’s a healthier option. Very, very easy to use and clean. Wish it was slightly bigger though.

Review Title: wish there was an option given to remove the grill from the tray so it could be very easy to clean it
Reviews: A superb Product, utilises minimum oil to cook food. Takes a while to cook but it is worth the wait, when you get to eat literally oil free food and at the same time tasty.Also its a little delicate and difficult to clean, wish there was an option given to remove the grill from the tray so it could be very easy to clean it. Overall a must recommended product for the kind of  results it can deliver.

I am loving the air fryer, have made potato wedges, medu vadas and am in the process of trying out fries. The reason I gave it 4 stars, is because of the size, I know that else where there is a bigger capacity air fryer available, and I think that would be perfect!!

Review Title: Its like drying under the sun
Reviews: I bought Airfrier after reading the reviews. The concept of air frying is not suitable for Indian cooking and taste. The food is dry after cooking. Its like drying under the sun. The quantity of certain food variety that can be cooked is less in a batch. More trays in vertical direction like a stack should have been provided. The food sticks to the mesh and difficult to clean. Its good for finger chips. Might be good to cook meat -not tired. Dont expect more.

Great for quick snacks viz., fries, off the shelf potato bites, tikkis, burgers.  Paneer shahslik is a household hit as is mini pizzas. Overall a great buy!  Wish we had food seperators and additional cooking tray so that we could cook double qty at one time.  These items are available abroad so I guess soon it will be made here...  We cook only veg food in this fryer, but there will be a whole lot of possibilities for non-veg lovers.

Review Title: has added tremendous amount of convenience in my kitchen as you can pretty much put the stuff in it
Reviews: have been using this for the last few months, has added tremendous amount of convenience in my kitchen as you can pretty much put the stuff in it, shut it and forget it. The app available for the product has a number of recipes. There is also a fairly active facebook community that is useful for recipes as well as tips and tricks. The build quality could have been slightly more robust which is why this scores 4 and not 5 stars.

This air fryer surely won our hearts from Day 1. It not only saves on unwanted oil that we Indians add to fry food stuffs but retains the ingredient's taste without adding the unnatural taste of the heated /overheated oil.Mot suitable for light frying sausages, frankfurters etc, as they shrink or the skin cracks. Other than that we have tried non veg and veg foods - comes out better than deep frying.

Review Title: Good product but would never be part of your day to day cooking.
Reviews: Good... I use it mainly to reheat parathas, which come out crisp and fresh. Other than that its a fancy item, which you would use for first week and then keep it back in one corner of kitchen to be occasionally used.  If you are buying it for fries, they come out are horrible. Some things like mushrooms and baby corn come out great.

Review Title: Awesome product , Crispy food items without oil or with less oil
Reviews: Just tried to chicken nuggets and french fries, awesome.with just 10 ml of oil , i have fried 500 mg french fries and just another 10 ml of oil to fry chicken nuggets.The feedback is usage after 3 days, still planned a lot for yummy food items.NOTE:As it is amazon full filled items. it didnt have any packing by amazon which used to be.

5 Stars for amazon,Recived philips air fryer and it had some issues, reported to amazon and they just changed it, fantastic customer serviceNow about the air fryer, philips has scored high, very neat and fantastic product,Cooked fryes ,chicken, fish and paneer, all food taste great and almost all food cooked in very less oilThere is a very strong need for other attachments like backing try and others also need basting brushUnbelievably satisfied😌

it is a good product which allows you to enjoy food which is normally fried but without the extra calories. However, it takes a longer time to 'airfry'. Also not all cuisines can be air fried. Very good for french fries though.

Review Title: Phillips viva air fryer is a useful item considering the consciousness of excess cholesterol today
Reviews: Phillips viva air fryer is a useful item considering the consciousness of excess cholesterol  today. It would help if either Phillips or Amazon organise "at home" demos on how various indian dishes can be made using this fryer since we are able to use for only a few vegetables and dishes

Review Title: original taste, easy cooking and healthy stuff
Reviews: This is a very good product. Since I got this we tried French fries, chicken nuggets, chicken wings, Basa fish and all are excellent in taste. Home made or frozen both are great. All these done almost without oil. I bought a brush which my wife used. Great stuff.

Review Title: I received the philips air fryer in perfect condition. I have used the product to make ...
Reviews: Thanks , Amazon ! ! I received the philips air fryer in perfect condition . I have used the product to make finger chips , tandoori pomfret , chicken steak & fried vegetables  , till today  . I am very happy with the product & am sure I can use it to make many more lip- smacking delicacies .

Review Title: Nice innovation and a big thumbs up
Reviews: First of all, kudos to Amazon for a fine delivery. Very well packed and protected to avoid any external damage. Now the product, using it for almost 3 weeks now and I am satisfied. Oil is used far less than it was being consumed earlier, but my only issue so far is that chicken seems to be remaining under cooked even after being cooked for 20 mins at 180-200 degree Celsius. Amazing fries though, tried many things already like chicken tikka, chicken 65, all working fell.Over all, a big thumbs up

Hi I purchased this fryer from Amazon around week ago and I am very happy with it its basically useful for nonveg dishes like chicken .veg item tends to feel very dry it can't take place of conventional oil frying it's more like a roasting a dish rather than frying I made chicken legs chicken tikka and mcain fries it all turned out very well but veg kababs were very dry its difficult to eat them buy it only if u are non veg lover or else buy a otg it will save u lot of money
